verses.name: Mark 6:45
verses.text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship, and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida, while he sent away the people.

verses.name: Mark 6:46
verses.text: And when he had sent them away, he departed into a mountain to pray.

verses.name: Mark 6:47
verses.text: And when even was come, the ship was in the midst of the sea, and he alone on the land.

verses.name: Mark 6:48
verses.text: And he saw them toiling in rowing; for the wind was contrary unto them: and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them, walking upon the sea, and would have passed by them.
